scripts.build_jellyfin-web: cd jellyfin-web && npm ci --no-audit && USE_SYSTEM_FONTS=1 npm run build:production
scripts.build_jellyfin-web:dev: cd jellyfin-web && npm ci --no-audit && USE_SYSTEM_FONTS=1 npm run build:development
scripts.build_all: npm run build:jellyfin-web && npm run prepare:jellyfin-interface
